description: The initiative aims to transform waste management in Cartagena through the Ambientado App, which connects recyclers with waste generators. It promotes recycling as a source of income for impoverished communities while fostering responsible tourism through the Circular Tourism program. By leveraging technology and community engagement, the initiative seeks to change perceptions of waste, making it a valuable resource, and ultimately contributing to a cleaner, more sustainable environment.
name: Ambientados SAS BIC
